Apart from poor nutritional status, the risk of maternal and
child death is increased by  lack of access to good qualityhealth care, lack of education of mothers, and unhealthyliving conditions.  Women who survive the complicationsof pregnancy and childbirth may suffer painful and/orembarrassing disabilities.
